Info

Defines class VerboseRoot with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates API for setup verbose class path from metaclass.

class ats_utilities.VerboseRoot(name: str, bases: Tuple[type, ...], dct: Dict[Any, Any])[source]¶

Bases: type

Defines class VerboseRoot with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates API for setup verbose class path with metaclass. This metaclass is designed to set a verbose attribute on classes; it creates based on the module path and a specified root package name. It conditionally formats this attribute to reflect the class’s module path or a specified root package name.

It defines:

attributes:
package_name - Root package name of framework.
methods:
__new__ - New VerboseRoot constructor.
package_name: str = 'ATS_UTILITIES'¶
ats_utilities.auto_str(mcs: Any) → Any[source]¶

Auto define class dunder method __str__.

Returns:

Updated class for __str__ definition

Return type:

<Any>

Exceptions:

None
